title: HOUR 2 - Steve Nash, Nick Wright
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Steve Nash, Nick Wright
description:
It became breaking news that the Brooklyn Nets parted ways with Steve Nash. Nick Wright joined to talk what's next with the Brooklyn Nets, Kawhi Leonard and more. Also what are the Lakers going to do now that Miles Turner basically said "Hey Lakers, trade for me"

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
